attributes.action: Save the main front building with its clock tower of Maltby Grammar/Comp School
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of Maltby wish to see Maltby's old grammar school frontage, with its iconic clock tower, preserved and made fit for purpose, when the Maltby acadamy does a partial rebuild on the site.
We believe the building, one of the finest in Maltby, is the heritage of the people of Maltby, and also should be for future generations of Maltby's children.
